name: Terraform
description: Run a Terraform on the build agent
author: Peter Groenewegen - Xpirit

inputs.name: TemplatePath
inputs.label: Terraform template path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source path where templates are stored

inputs.name: Arguments
inputs.label: Terraform arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments passed to terraform: plan, apply, validate etc

inputs.name: PlanPath
inputs.label: Plan file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of plan file to use in apply step. Can also be used to specify alternate path to tf files.

inputs.name: InstallTerraform
inputs.label: Install terraform
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if you want terraform deployed on your build agent

inputs.name: Version
inputs.label: Terraform version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version to install on the build agent, use latest for latest version

inputs.name: UseAzureSub
inputs.label: Use Azure service principal endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if you want to use an Azure endpoint configured with a Service Principal

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceNameARM
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription.

inputs.name: ManageState
inputs.label: Init state in Azure storage
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if you want the extention to init the state in blobstorage

inputs.name: SpecifyStorageAccount
inputs.label: Specify Storage Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if you want to specify the storage account.

inputs.name: StorageAccountResourceGroup
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a pre-existing ARM resource group.

inputs.name: StorageAccountRM
inputs.label: Storage Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a pre-existing ARM storage account.

inputs.name: StorageContainerName
inputs.label: Container Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the name the container within the given StorageAccount.
